commonDropFiles: Drag and drop your files here
commonNewVersion: Version %s is ready to be installed
electronAboutDescription: AnyType - це програмне забезпечення наступного покоління, котре прибирає перешкоди між програмами, повертає користувачам конфіденційність і право власності на дані.
headerSettingsIdentityInfoText: Anytype Identity can be linked to your global name in the network. Become a member to select your custom name.
authInviteLabel: Введіть код запрошення. Якщо у вас ще немає — відвідайте anytype.io для реєстрації раннього доступу. Ми запрошуємо нових тестувальників поступово.
authDisclaimer: Продовжуючи, ви погоджуєтеся з нашими Умовами використання та Політикою конфіденційності
authLoginLabel: Enter your key to access your vault
authDeleteTitleDeleted: Vault data removed from the backup node
authDeleteDescription: We're sorry to see you go. Once you request your vault to be deleted, you have 30 days to cancel this request. After 30 days, your vault data is permanently removed from the backup node, you won't be able to sign into Anytype on new devices.
authDeleteDescriptionDeleted: All logged-in devices may have your data stored locally. However, you are not able to sign into Anytype on new devices using your Key.
authDeleteRemovePopupTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your local vault data?
authDeleteRemovePopupText: Обрані об'єкти будуть видалені безповоротно. Ви не зможете скасувати цю дію.
authOnboardPhraseLabel: It replaces login and password. Keep it safe — only you are responsible for your data. You can find this Key later in app settings.
authOnboardEmailLabel: We'd love to share tips, tricks and product updates with you. Your email is never linked to your identity. We won't share your data. Ever.
authOnboardPersonaLabel: Select one role or background that best fits you
authOnboardUseCaseTitle: What do you want to use Anytype for?
authOnboardUseCaseLabel: Select one use case that suits you
onboardingExperiencePurposeTitle: What Life Area Is This Space For?
onboardingExperienceUsecaseStartFromScra: Structure your space yourself. If you change your mind, you can always add an experience from our gallery later on.
pageMainEmptyDescription: Оберіть Об'єкт, який буде показуватися щоразу як ви входите. Ви завжди можете змінити його в налаштуваннях.
pageMainVoidErrorText:
Looks like you've cleaned the house. Ready to start fresh?
Create a new space to get things rolling!
pageMainVoidSelectText: No channels opened. Select one on the left panel or create new.
pageMainDateEmptyText: There is nothing here for this date yet
pageAuthDeletedAccountDeletionTitle: This vault is planned for deletion in %s
pageAuthSetupImportText: Double-check your recovery phrase — extra spaces or typos can break it.
pageAuthMigrateInitText: We're laying the groundwork for our new chats. Including counters, notifications and other features needed for smooth chat experience. It might take a little while, but don't worry, your data is safe.
pageAuthMigrateInfoProcessText: You'll see a loading screen during the update. Once finished, you can continue using the app normally.
pageAuthMigrateInfoDataText1: During this update, your data remains fully secure. The update is performed directly on your device, and your synced data remains unaffected. We'll just copy it to a new format, and a local backup will be created on your device, containing all your data in the previous format.
pageAuthMigrateInfoDataText2: The reason we're retaining this backup is to debug and assist you, in case of unforeseen.
pageAuthMigrateText: This may take some time. Please don't close the app until the process is complete.
pageAuthMigrateErrorNotEnoughSpaceText: Please clear approximately %s of space and run the process again.
pageSettingsSpaceIndexEntrySpaceTooltip:
Entry Space cannot be shared.
Create a new one to invite members.

popupSettingsPersonalDefaultObjectTypeDe: Встановити тип за замовчуванням для нових об'єктів
popupSettingsMobileQRSubTitle: Log in your vault on Android and iOS
popupSettingsMobileQRText: Launch Anytype app, tap “Login” and then “Scan QR code”. Reveal and scan the code below to login to your vault.
popupSettingsPhraseText: Your key protects your vault. You'll need it to sign in if you don't have access to your devices. Keep it in a safe place. Click to show:
popupSettingsApiEmpty: You haven’t created any API keys yet
popupSettingsPinText: Set a 6-digit PIN for your application screen when unattended. PIN adds a quick layer of privacy for your app. It prevents casual viewing but doesn't enhance data encryption. Your primary data remains secure with your account Key. PIN protection is recommended when you step away from your device.
popupSettingsPinVerify: Щоб продовжити, спочатку підтвердьте, що це Ви. Введіть поточний PIN-код
popupSettingsPinSelectError: PIN-коди не збігаються, спробуйте ще раз
popupSettingsDataManagementLocalStorageT: Щоб заощадити місце на вашому локальному пристрої, ви можете вивантажити всі ваші файли на наш зашифрований вузол резервного копіювання. Файли будуть завантажені назад, коли ви їх відкриєте.

In order to save space on this device, you can remove all your files. Be careful: your client is in local-only mode, and data is not backing up to external nodes. Ensure that your files are synced to your other devices before removing them.
popupSettingsDataManagementDeleteText: Once you request your vault to be deleted, you have 30 days to cancel this request. After 30 days, your encrypted vault data is permanently removed from the backup node, you won't be able to sign into Anytype on new devices.
popupSettingsDataManagementDataPublishEm:
You haven’t published anything to the web yet.
Open an object and hit Share → Publish to Web to make it live.
popupSettingsSpaceIndexSpaceTypePersonal: Цей простір створено при наскрізному шифруванні, забезпечуючи конфіденційність і безпеку даних користувача та впевнену онлайн або автономну взаємодію.

popupSettingsSpaceIndexShareDefaultText: Entry space can't be shared. Create a new one to share
popupSettingsSpaceIndexShareInviteText: Generate invite link and share the space with other members
popupSettingsSpaceIndexShareLinkText: Share this invite link so that others can join your Space
popupSettingsSpaceIndexShareManageText: Copy invite link, approve requests and manage members
popupSettingsSpaceIndexStorageText: You can store your files on our encrypted backup node. If you reach the limit, files will be stoped syncing and be stored only locally.

upsellBannerMembersLimitUsageText: You've reached the limit of %s editors.
popupSettingsImportText: Оберіть застосунок або формат джерела даних
popupSettingsImportCsvText: Після, оберіть або ZIP-архів або Markdown файл (.md) для завершення імпорту
popupSettingsImportFavouriteTitle: Selected objects will appear in your Pinned widget
popupSettingsExportText: Choose the format for your data export
popupSettingsExportMarkdownText1: Всі дані Простору, окрім стовпців й стилів кольору буде експортовано до Markdown. Це вільний й розбірливий формат, який можна відкрити й відредагувати багатьма безплатний й красивими додатками.
popupSettingsExportMarkdownText2: Якщо ви хочете додати всі ваші дані до AnyType, використовуйте Імпорт.
popupSettingsSpaceHomepageText: Виберіть Об'єкт, що буде показуватися при вході
popupSettingsSpaceShareMenuInviteEditorD: People with link can edit and write in chat
popupSettingsSpaceShareMenuInviteViewerD: People with link can view and read chat
popupSettingsSpaceShareMenuInviteManualD: Owner must approve each join request
popupSettingsSpaceShareGenerateInviteDis: You need to be online to share the space
popupSettingsMembershipText: Joining Anytype network means contributing to its story
popupSettingsMembershipSlide0Text: As a valued member your voice matters! Engage in exclusive events, shape strategic choices, and influence our roadmap.
popupSettingsMembershipSlide1Text: Members enjoy higher backup storage & sync limits, invitations for multiple guests to collaborate in spaces, and a unique identity on the Anytype Network.
popupSettingsMembershipSlide2Text: Your contribution supports our team and endorses our vision of a user-owned, secure, and collaborative digital network.
popupSettingsMembershipSlide3Text: Our network's value exceeds the sum of its parts. Your membership sustains the infrastructure for its growth which underpins this network.
popupSettingsMembershipSpecial: Would you like to use Anytype for business, education, etc.? Please let us know here︎.
popupSettingsOnboardingLocalOnlyWarningT:
Anytype can't transfer your data between directories.
Your Spaces data will be downloaded from another device.
Please ensure that you have such a device active on the same network.
popupSettingsOnboardingLocalOnlyNote:
This is an experimental mode.
Use at your own risk.
popupSettingsOnboardingLocalOnlyConfirmT: Local-only mode is an experimental feature and does not provide security benefits. Please use it at your own risk, as data loss may occur.
popupSettingsDataOffloadWarningText: Всі медіа-файли, що зберігаються в AnyType буде видалено з вашого пристрою. Вони можуть бути завантажені знову з резервної копії вузла або з іншого пристрою.
popupSettingsDataOffloadWarningTextLocal: Be careful: your client is in local-only mode, and data is not backing up to external nodes. Ensure that your files are synced to your other devices before removing them.
popupSettingsDeleteTitle1: 1. You have 30 days to cancel vault deletion
popupSettingsDeleteText1: We're sorry to see you go. Once you request your vault to be deleted, you have 30 days to cancel this request. After 30 days, your vault data is permanently removed from the backup node, you won't be able to sign into Anytype on new devices.
popupSettingsDeleteText2: Оскільки Anytype зберігає всі ваші дані локально на пристрої, вам потрібно також видалити їх з інших пристроїв. Для цього треба запустити та видалити дані з AnyType або просто видалити програму.
popupSettingsDeleteCheckboxLabel: I have read it and want to delete my vault
popupSettingsImportCsvUseFirstRow: Використовувати перший рядок як імена стовпців
popupSettingsImportCsvTranspose: Ви можете перемістити рядки та стовпці
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep12: Open My Connections and then click Develop or manage integrations.
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep13: Натисніть на Нова інтеграція або Створити нову інтеграцію.
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep14: Оберіть ваш простір та назву Набору для інтеграції
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep15:
Important! ️Go to Capabilities and select following capabilities and press Save changes:
  • Read content
  • Read user information
️
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep16: Скопіюйте Таємницю внутрішньої інтеграції для з'єднання та імпорту даних.
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep2Descr: Додайте інтеграцію до сторінок, які ви хочете імпортувати в AnyType. Сторінка буде імпортована з усіма вкладеними у неї сторінками. Виберіть кореневий об'єкт для імпорту всіх об'єктів.
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep21: Click on three dots on the upper right corner, then click Connect to (you need to scroll the menu). Select your Anytype integration.
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep22: Press Confirm. Now you just need to paste your Internal Integration Token to Anytype. Hint: Newly created integrations may produce a 'page not found' error on the first import. If this happens, wait a few minutes and try running the import again.
popupSettingsImportNotionWarningTitle: Деякі формати даних будуть імпортовані як текст
popupSettingsImportNotionWarningLi3: Формули та зведені результати будуть розміщені як значення
popupSettingsImportNotionWarningLi4: Databases will look as Objects with Properties in Anytype documents
popupSettingsImportNotionDescription: Імпортуйте файли Notion через Notion API за допомогою 3 простих кроків
popupSettingsImportNotionHowTo: How to import from Notion (see FAQ)
popupSettingsImportNotionIntegrationList: Створіть інтеграцію, необхідну для отримання файлів Notion
Параметри & користувачів → Мої з'єднання → Створення та керування інтеграціями → Нова інтеграція
Надайте право зчитування даних про користувача для інтеграції
Налаштування інтеграцій → Права → Зчитування даних користувача без email
Додайте Інтеграцію до сторінок, які ви хочете імпортувати
Оберіть документ → ... → Додати з'єднання → Підтвердити Інтеграцію
popupSettingsImportObsidianDescription: Import your Obsidian files with 3 simple steps
popupSettingsImportObsidianList12:
• Open the Vault switcher (shown at launch or via File → Open Vault).
  • Right-click the vault you want to export and choose “Reveal in system explorer”.
popupSettingsImportObsidianList21: Click Import Files and select your entire Vault folder (or a subfolder) with .md files
popupSettingsImportObsidianList22:
• On some platforms (like Linux and Windows), folder selection may not be supported. In that case, compress the folder into a .zip archive and import the archive instead.
  • Anytype will process your files and automatically create objects for each Markdown file.
popupSettingsImportObsidianList32:
• [[Internal Links]] → become linked objects in Anytype, so the connections between your notes are preserved.
  • Frontmatter (the --- metadata at the top) → becomes object properties.
popupLogoutTitle: Make sure you saved your login key
popupLogoutText: We have no way to recover your login key - it's yours alone. Please save it before logging out.
popupConfirmCloseAIOnboardingText: Are you sure you want to exit? Your progress will be lost.

popupConfirmWelcomeText:
Your Space is an encrypted, local-first container.
Spaces can be shared and co-created with others.
Each space contains a Graph of objects.
popupConfirmWelcomeButton: Show me what I can build
popupConfirmLostPhraseTitle: Anytype cannot recover your Key for you
popupConfirmLostPhraseTextWindows:
Currently, there are no methods of accessing your key, as we do not store a copy of it. Check out the other places where it might stored:

  • In system password storage. We did it for you automatically
  • Inside a password manager if you use one
  • On a piece of paper stored in a secure place chosen prior
popupConfirmLostPhraseTextLinux:
Currently, there are no methods of accessing your key, as we do not store a copy of it. Check out the other places where it might stored:

  • In system password storage. We did it for you automatically
  • Inside a password manager if you use one
  • On a piece of paper stored in a secure place chosen prior
popupConfirmLostPhraseTextMac:
Currently, there are no methods of accessing your key, as we do not store a copy of it. Check out the other places where it might stored:

Switching to a different release channel will:

Your current account data remains in its previous location.

popupMigrationOnboardingText1:
Тепер ви використовуєте нову і вдосконалену версію Anytype.
Вона все ще зашифрована, є найбезпечнішою програмою для вашої особистої інформації та першочергово працює офлайн.
popupMigrationOnboardingText2: Оновлена версія Anytype на iOS і Android також доступна для завантаження! Якщо ви ще цього не зробили, будь ласка, відскануйте цей QR-код, щоб оновити свої пристрої:
popupMigrationOnboardingText3: Ми раді почути ваші відгуки про нові можливості.
popupMigrationImportText1: Будь ласка, витратьте декілька хвилин на перевірку, що ваші дані були імпортовані правильно.
popupMigrationImportText2: Ще дещо. Оновлена версія Anytype на iOS і Android також доступна для завантаження! Якщо ви ще цього не зробили, будь ласка, відскануйте цей QR-код, щоб оновити AnyType на своїх пристроях:
popupMigrationImportText3: У разі виникнення будь-яких проблем, ви можете повторити процес міграції за допомогою старого комп'ютерного додатка або відвідати наш форум спільноти.
popupPhraseLabel1: Your key is represented by a recovery phrase — 12 random words that generate your vault on this device.
popupPhraseSubTitle2: Whoever has the key, has access
popupPhraseLabel2: Anyone who knows these words can access your vault. Right now, you are the only person in the world who knows them.
popupPhraseLabel3: All computational resources on Earth are not enough to break in. If you lose your key, it cannot be recovered. Store it somewhere safe — in a password manager or written down on paper.
popupUsecaseListText:
Explore experiences made by power users.
Simply install to your space and boost up your workflow.
popupUsecaseListEmptyCategory: No Experiences found in the %s category
popupUsecaseBanner: We're updating our Gallery experiences so they're more compatible with our latest version. Read more.
popupRelationEmpty: There are no Properties shown yet
popupShareTitle: Share Anytype with those you care about
popupShareLinkText: The everything app for those who celebrate trust & autonomy. %s
menuVaultPathText: Your key files will be stored here. Click to change the path
menuSmileEmptyFilter: There are no items named "%s"Try to find a new one or upload your image
menuBlockCoverEmptyFilter: Немає обкладинок з такою назвою "%s"Спробуйте знайти нову або завантажити своє зображення
menuBlockLayoutConflict: This object has layout settings that differ from the type.
menuDataviewFilterListEmpty: Немає налаштованих фільтрів у цьому Поданні
menuDataviewOptionListTypeToCreate: Введіть текст, аби створити новий варіант
menuDataviewSortNoSortsApplied: Немає налаштованого сортування для цього Подання
menuDataviewSourceEmptySourceLabel: Select a parameter to collect objects by it
menuDataviewTemplateSetDefaultForView: Set as default for this view
menuDataviewTemplateUnsetDefaultForView: Unset as default for this view
menuTypeLayoutDescription: Objects may have layout settings that differ from the type, including featured properties and alignment. You can make the layout identical for all objects of this Type.
menuSyncStatusEmptyLocal: Your Vault is currently in local-only mode, so your data isn't being synced to Anytype nodes.
menuSyncStatusEmpty: There are no objects to show
menuSyncStatusIncentiveBannerLabel: %s %s couldn’t be synced because you’re run out of storage. Please upgrade or clean up your storage.
menuPublishInfoTooltip:
Published object will be uploaded to our publishing server and will be accessible via the URL as a static, unencrypted HTML page. Linked objects will not be published.
Currently, not all blocks are supported for publishing, such as Queries, Collections and Properties. Default limit is 10MB per object for free plans and 100MB for paid plans.
menuPublishBecomeMemberText: Get a custom domain and higher limits by becoming a member
toastInviteUpdate: Invite link has been changed to %s
toastImportStart: Import process has started and may take some time
toastObjectTypeAdded: Object Type %s has been added to your Library
toastRelationAdded: Property %s has been added to your Library
toastObjectTypeRemoved: Object Type %s has been removed from your Library
toastRelationRemoved: Property %s has been removed from your Library
toastSetDefaultTemplate: This Template was set as default
toastFileLimitReached: Your local storage exceeds syncing limit. Locally stored files won't be synced
toastChatAttachmentsLimitReached: You can upload only %s %s at a time
survey0Text: Hi there! We hope you're enjoying your experience in Anytype! We'd love to hear your feedback so we can keep improving the product.
survey1Text: We'd love to learn more about why you've chosen to delete your vault. Would you be willing to take 3 minutes to help us improve?
survey2Text: Вітання! Ми будемо вдячні, якщо ви допоможете нам покращити AnyType, взявши участь у 5-хвилинному опитуванні.
survey3Text: Привіт! Ми сподіваємося, що вам подобається досвід роботи з AnyType! Ви не можете виділити 5 хвилин, аби покращити наш продукт?
survey4Text: Take our 1-minute survey to enhance space sharing. Your input makes Anytype better for everyone.
survey5Text: Take our 1-minute survey to enhance collaboration. Your input makes Anytype better for everyone.
widget3Description: Widget with a compact list view
widgetEmptyFavoriteLabel: Pin objects here using the icon in the top right.
spaceDeleteWarningText: This will permanently delete the space. You can't undo this action. Please type the name of the space to confirm deletion.
spaceLeaveWarningText: "%s" will be removed from your devices and you will no longer have access to it
sidebarObjectRelationEmpty: No Properties yet. Add some to this type
sidebarObjectOrphanLabel: Unlinked objects that do not have a direct link or backlink with other objects in the graph.
sidebarObjectEmptyCreate:
It's empty here.
Create your first objects to get started.
sidebarObjectRelationLocalDescription: These properties exist only in this object and aren't part of its type. Add them to the type to use in all objects, or remove
sidebarTypeRelationLocalDescription: These properties exist in some objects but aren't part of the Type. Add them to make them appear in all objects of this Type.
sidebarMenuSpaceCreateDescriptionImport: Transfer your data from another app
deletedBanner: This Object is in the Bin and is shown in view mode
onboardingMainGraph11: Простір — це граф, і Anytype надає інструменти для природного способу мислення, де все презентовано як об'єкти з певними відношеннями, прямо як у реальному світі.
onboardingMainObject:
Description now exists in every object;
you can hide or show it whenever you want.
onboardingMainType: You can match the object settings to the Type settings with just one click.
onboardingStoreType11: This Library contains all types of Objects and Properties. It comes with preinstalled types, as well as types that can be uploaded to Anytype for different use cases.
onboardingStoreType21: Ви можете створювати власні типи з будь-яким компонуванням об'єктів для власних цілей. Крім того, ви можете зберегти будь-який існуючий об'єкт як шаблон бібліотеки, якщо вам потрібно часто ним користуватися.
onboardingStoreType22: Now, let's take a look at the Properties menu.
onboardingStoreRelation11: Properties are reusable links with meaning. Here you can see some examples of Properties, but the idea is that you can create your own Properties which are valuable to you and connect the Objects through them.
onboardingStoreRelation21: Establishing relations helps you to understand the graph and its structure better. You can also create Collections or Sets based on the relationships for quick access.
onboardingTypeDeleted1Description: Якщо хочете користуватися цим Об'єктом, змініть його Тип.
onboardingSourceDeleted1Title: Please check your Installed Types & Properties
onboardingSourceDeleted1Description: Some Objects in this Query use Types or Properties that have been removed from your Space. Visit the Library to re-install these entities and continue using your Set.
onboardingInlineSet1Description: Congratulations! You can embed a Query or Collection and modify it using Filters and Views without altering the original instance.
onboardingInlineSet2Description: Регулюйте правила та коригуйте подання відповідно до потрібного контексту.
onboardingInlineCollection1Description: Congratulations! You can embed a Query or Collection and modify it using filters and views without altering the original instance.
onboardingInlineCollection2Description: Регулюйте правила та коригуйте подання відповідно до потрібного контексту.
onboardingDefaultTypeDescription: Ви можете змінити тип і шаблон нового об'єкта у цьому меню.
onboardingTemplateSelectDescription: Легко перемикайте свої шаблони під час створення об'єктів.
onboardingSpacesText: This is your Space. Click here to share it with others, customize its name and icon, or securely migrate from other apps.
onboardingPinnedNewText: Pin what matters most. Pinned keeps your key objects close at hand. Choose the layout that fits you — lists, boards, or calendars.
onboardingObjectsNewText: Organize with Types. Each object has a Type. Think of it as a super-tag that keeps things organized: Pages, Tasks, or any custom type you create. New objects automatically land in their category here.
onboardingPinnedOldText: Your Widgets are Now the ‘Pinned’ Section We’ve organized your sidebar widgets into the Pinned section, which is now your dedicated home for shortcuts. Your previous pins are preserved in old Pinned widget. You can re-pin your favorites from there and then remove the old widget when you’re ready.
onboardingObjectsOldText: All your Objects, by Type This section gathers all your objects into containers based on their Type. It’s the new, unified place to see everything you’ve made.
onboardingMembershipText: Join the Anytype Network through a membership plan. Explore our paid features or simply support our work. We're here because of you.
onboardingSyncStatusText: View your network and peer-to-peer connection status here, along with a list of synced objects.
onboardingMobileText: Sync to your mobile devices locally. Scan the QR code to download the iOS or Android App and make use of peer-to-peer sync.
onboardingCollectionsText: Create an object in the Collection. Use Collections to store and organise handpicked objects and files.
onboardingCollaborationText: Check out the new Collaboration category to explore experiences that help you co-create, share and collaborate.
onboardingChatsDescription: Anytype now supports real-time chat in Shared Channels — so your thoughts and dialogues can grow together.
onboardingChatsMockChatMessage0: Good to have chat here now
onboardingChatsMockChatMessage1: Yeah. Just created something from this
onboardingChatsMockChatMessage3: Feels like part of the space 🫧
onboardingChatsSlide0Text:
Spaces and Chats now show live previews and updates — one
place to follow everything that matters.
onboardingChatsSlide1Text:
A channel made for dialogue — where you can share, create, and
edit together in real time.
onboardingChatsSlide2Text:
Objects, lists and files appear in the sidebar — structured,
searchable, and always at hand.
onboardingChatsSlide3Title:
See all the latest updates and bug
fixes in the release notes
onboardingPrimitivesDescription: Important changes to how things work in Anytype
onboardingPrimitivesSlide0Text:
Object Types now define properties and layout. Any changes at
the type level apply to all objects of that type
onboardingPrimitivesSlide1Text:
Properties are now managed at the type level, while local
properties stay on the object level
onboardingPrimitivesSlide2Text:
Every type has a built-in list of its objects. You can also auto-
create a widget when a new object of this type is added.
onboardingPrimitivesSlide3Text:
Templates no longer define properties or layout. They inherit object
settings and only control content and default property values.
onboardingPrimitivesSlide4Title:
See all the latest updates and bug
fixes in the release notes

notificationImportSuccessText: Ви можете знайти імпортовані об'єкти в обраному просторі.
notificationImportErrorText: Вибачте, але щось пішло не так під час експорту. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз або повідомте нас, якщо це не працює.
notificationExportSuccessText: Ви можете знайти експортовані об'єкти у обраній теці.
notificationExportErrorText: Вибачте, але щось пішло не так під час експорту. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз або повідомте нас, якщо це не працює.
notificationGallerySuccessText: Experience was successfully installed to the '%s' space. You can now open and start using it.
notificationGalleryErrorText: Oops! '%s' wasn't installed. Please check your Internet connection and try again or post a report in our community.
notificationImportErrorText3: Internal error during import. Please report it to Anytype devs using Help -> Report a Bug. We will check.
notificationImportErrorText5: No objects found in the provided Notion integration. Open Notion and check that you have added the integration to the pages you want to export. Check our FAQ for more details.
notificationImportErrorText6: The import was canceled by the user.
notificationImportErrorText7: The number of lines of the CSV file exceeds limit of 1000 rows and 10 columns. Try splitting the file into smaller parts.
notificationImportErrorText8: Error when uploading a file. Check if you have enough space and try again.
notificationImportErrorText9: We don't have permission to import into this Anytype space.
notificationImportErrorText10: An error occurred during HTML rendering. Check the format of your HTML file.
notificationImportErrorText11: The imported AnyBlock file has an unsupported format. It may have been exported from an old or unsupported version of Anytype. Update it and try exporting again.
notificationImportErrorText12: Notion API returned an internal error. Most likely something is broken on the Notion side. Try running the import again later.
notificationImportErrorText13: Notion API returned an exceeded limits error. Wait a few minutes and try running the import again.
notificationImportErrorText14: No objects of the required format were found in the imported archive. Make sure you have selected the correct import format, such as HTML or Markdown
notificationImportErrorText17: No objects of the required format were found in the imported folder. Make sure you have selected the correct file format, such as HTML or Markdown
notificationApproveSuccessText: Your request to join '%s' space has been approved with %s access rights. The space will be available in your vault soon.
notificationRemoveSuccessText: You were removed from '%s' space, or the space has been deleted by the owner
notificationDeclineSuccessText: Your request to join the '%s' space has been declined.
notificationPermissionSuccessText: Your access rights were changed to '%s' in the '%s' space.
challengeDescription: This extension requires a 4-digit code for limited access to your account. Proceed only if you trust the extension.
networkMode0Text: Створити резервну копію до мережі Anytype
networkMode1Text: Не створювати резервні копії; синхронізуйте тільки у локальній мережі
networkMode2Text: Резервне копіювання до самостійно розміщеної мережі
aiOnboardingWelcomeMessage: Hello! I'm here to help you create your perfect space. What project, idea, or challenge would you like to work on?
aiOnboardingBuildingSpace: Wonderful selection! Building your space now...
aiOnboardingSpaceReady: Your space is ready! Time to bring your ideas to life 🚀
aiOnboardingStatusUnderstanding: Understanding how Anytype can help you...
